评论详情: The quality of the fabric is amazing!!

The jacket was very cute and exactly what i imagined for the outfit. It fit well across my shoulders but the sleeve length was a tad long (but I like that). It was thin so I wouldn’t recommend using it for warmth. The jacket worked well, but the only bad thing was the sequins would get caught on each other when I’d move my arm up.

The jacket was purchased to wear to the Taylor Swift concert.  However, when it arrived and I tried it on, it was more of a duster jacket instead of a blazer.  It came down past my knees.  Not at all the look I was looking for so I am returning it.  I wish it would have been an actual blazer because it would have been perfect for the concert.
It was a beautiful, lined jacket, but it was so big, I had to return it. I will try to reorder in my size.

评论概述: Very beautiful, but much longer than pictured.
评论详情: It's beautiful, but it sooooo much longer than pictured. It's really more like a duster. Had to return for that reason.

I bought this to wear to the Taylor Swift Eras tour. It was the perfect amount of sparkle.  The blazer came to my thigh and I did size up for more comfort and loose look. The sequins stayed on, no problem there and quality was good for the price.
I was very happy with this. It was true to size and was very comfortable. Sparklies stay on jacket. Received many compliments.

I love sparkle and this blazer is beyond sparkly! I took this on a recent cruise and got so many compliments.  Since I got the mulitcolor option, it goes with everything. The sleeves ended up being a little long for me so I just rolled them up a little and I was good to go. There is a lining so my skin is not against the scratchy sequins. I ended up wearing this with several outfits on the cruise and it looked great with both a dress and a jumpsuit! I highly recommend this sequin blazer!

评论概述: Feels like a Golden Girls outfit
评论详情: And I'm here for it. Wanna be sparkly? This is it. Do it.

If you like sparkle, then this jacket is for you! I bought it for a Halloween costume, but I'll likely get more use out of it. It has a nice relax fit with an open front, but it isn't too big or boxy. It's SO SPARKLY & the sequins aren't scratchy. The sleeves are a touch long, but I'm on the petite side with shorter arms. This fit me well in a size small. I'm 5'1", about 130lbs and have a 34C bust.
Looks cheap. Very thin

I suppose if you call it a jacket and a blazer and a cardigan in the item description, I guess you covered all your bases, but I mostly thought it would fit better. It's definitely "open front" because in addition to having no closure, the cut just constantly flaps open all over the place. The construction is two layers, the outer sequined layer and an inner layer that seems to be out of the bug screen for a tent. Which, if you were wondering, isn't comfortable against your skin. This dual layer construction looks as cheap as it sounds and feels. I put it at two stars because it does fulfill the role of "sparkly af" and if you have other layers it can function as costume clothing.
Its a nice jacket, but a little thin.. There is inner lining and the sequence is attached to a thin lace-like material.. Its still doable jacket to bling up an outfit..

From my wife: This is a summer weight sequin jacket! My best description is Mother-of-the-bride at a mermaid wedding. It's fun! Follow the size chart, but it runs a tad big. I think I'll give it some marabou trim! Then, it will be perfect. I like it!
I have decided to keep the jacket, but it really is not worth the price. But I will keep it.
I love this jacket! It’s so cute and fits great. I ordered my normal size and had no issues. It does have a bit of stretch to it as well

I am so in love with this sequin jacket! I was surprised as how well it was made but the fit was perfect. I didn’t think it would fit right since I am only 5 ft tall and most things don’t fit right but this did. I like that it is lined and has long sleeve that aren’t too long and an open front.  The fit is loose so you can move around in it without being restricted. The silver sequins are very shiny and well attached which I was worried they would easily fall off but so far none have. I just wish there would have been a light blue or true green ones - I would have gotten them too. They matched the description in the ad.
This fit like I expected it to. I'm going to use it as part of my costume for Halloween - which I do not have all of it yet. Definitely sparkly and it isn't scratchy to wear.

I absolutely love this jacket. I knew I was going to love it when I ordered it but didnt expect to love it this much. It is well fitted, super soft, so sparkly and fits just right. For someone with large shoulders it is actually super flattering but also does not look bulky at the front. It is literally perfect. Highly recommend it to anyone.

I love this jacket!!!  It is fully lined with a lovely soft lining, so no itchiness at all.  I did size up and glad I did for a little bit looser look and it is super comfortable.  It has the small sequins, with just the right amount of sparkle.  I have looked at these over the past couple of years at different companies and this price is a great value for a quality garment.  It is lightweight, so it can be worn year around.  Would look so cute with denim too.  Definitely dress it way up or dress up a casual look too.  (Mrs. Valiant)

It's Super Cool and not Blingy as it shows in the online pictures. But I'm okay with that. It's a "Open" jacket which means it's meant to stay open over a shirt or blouse . It's very stylish w/a Skirt or jeans or even a pair of black leggings. It'song enough in the back to cover the booty area if wearing leggings too. It's lined on the inside so it adds to the quality . Good choice.

this is really cute and lightweight! i love it and can't wait to wear during the holidays. it's a more relaxed fit, and given the length, i could potentially put a belt on it and wear it as more of a dress (with tights of course)

This open sequin cardigan is very sparkly and lightweight. I am 5’ and the sleeves fit pretty well and aren’t overly large at the wrist. The ends are a simple finish just sewn to the lining so for my shorter arms I can roll it up and give it a bit more of a finished look. I didn’t have an issue with the sequin shed, but I did shake it out before I tried it on. There are a few stray threads that I’m afraid to cut because I don’t know if they will make the sequins fall off so I’ll leave them unless they get in the way. Overall, this is an easy way to dress up any outfit and can be worn in many ways. If you want a more fitted waist you could add a belt or cinch the back with a pin on the inside. It did arrive wrinkled due to shipping, but those can be steamed out easily.

评论概述: For a sequined jacket this is pretty bland
评论详情: The length of the jacket is too long, sleeves too short, and it's shapeless and has no form to it at all. The fabric is crunchy feeling and really stiff and uncomfortable. Also, no pockets and no buttons or zipper anywhere either so you can't close it up or change the look of it at all. It's not well made at all and it doesn't look good on. I wouldn't recommend getting this one.

评论概述: Pretty but not the best quality
评论详情: This jacket is so sparkly and fun, but the quality leaves a bit to be desired. The way the fabric sits it wants to roll in the front, showing the black lining. The whole thing feels sloppily made. Fits true to size if not a little large.

High quality blazer! Fits true to size and the sleeves are not too long on me (I'm 5'3" and normally wear a size 4). The sequins seem sewn on well. The green color is nice and dark and in certain lights it almost has a purple effect. Can't wait to wear this around the holidays!

I absolutely love how this open jacket shimmer with shades of green blue and black. It is absolutely striking and fits true to size. You have to wear it open as there is no closures in the front. The only reason I didn’t give it five stars because around the wrist area And the bottom of the garment it is sort of freed and just doesn’t look like it’s well made.

I wanted something very sparkly for certain events and ordered this jacket.  It is very nice and definitely sparkles like I wanted it to, but it is slightly flimsy, but that will also make it lightweight and not too warm to wear.  I would suggest maybe ordering a size larger than you normally wear if you don't like your jackets to feel snug.

评论概述: Perfect Fit and Stunning Style – A Must-Have Sequin Cardigan!
评论详情: First things first, the fit of this sequin cardigan is absolutely perfect! I was pleasantly surprised by how well it fit – no tightness, and the arms fit just right. It feels great on the back, with just the right amount of stretch to keep it comfortable while still maintaining a polished, formal look.  Visually, this cardigan is a showstopper. I love how versatile it is, allowing me to easily dress up or down depending on the occasion. Despite having a larger chest, I was pleased to find that the cardigan stayed relatively 'closed,' giving it a casual yet chic appearance without any awkward sliding. The open front design is perfect for layering and adds a touch of elegance to any outfit.  One of my favorite details is the extra lace embellishment around the bottom of the sleeves and along the bust. This small touch really elevates the cardigan, giving it a playful and stylish vibe that stands out. The sequins are beautifully done, adding just the right amount of sparkle without being overwhelming.  The comfort level is exceptional, thanks to the soft and smooth full lining that prevents the sequins from scratching the skin. The fabric is soft, breathable, and easy to clean, making this cardigan a comfortable and fashionable choice for any occasion. Whether it’s a party, concert, wedding, or just a night out, this sequin cardigan will make you shine and stand out from the crowd.  Overall, this cardigan is a fantastic addition to my wardrobe. It’s comfortable, stylish, and versatile enough to pair with a variety of outfits. If you’re looking to add a touch of glamour and sparkle to your look, I highly recommend this sequin cardigan – you won’t be disappointed!

My wife loves this jacket, not too busy and doesn't use the large sequin so it really looks like one reviewer noted, like an oil spill on water, it's very edgy. Style wise it's really meant to be worn open, don't expect to button it up, not really how it was designed. It's lightweight and decent quality. I would recommend going one size up to be safe, worked well for my wife. She's 5'4" with a large bust and broad shoulders, she's what they consider a bit on the plus size now aparently and XL fits perfect.

Honestly, disappointed. After reading reviews, I was expecting a well made jacket, however, I wouldn’t call it that. It is rather poorly assembled, very loose. The sleeves are not finished very well and the overall look is messy and sloppy. As to the fit, i should have ordered my usual size of Large, but ordered an xl. It is far too large! I will be doing a lot of tailoring and taking in on this to make it fit properly and look presentable. On the positive side, the sequins are nice, it is lined, and has good length. If you are looking for a loose, open fit, this might be for you. A belt will probably do wonders for it.  I would suggest that you order your normal size.

I like this jacket. It adds a bit of easy sparkle to any outfit. It is a bit boxy, but that’s ok for me - I’d just slip it over a dress or T-shirt and jeans if I want a bit of pizazz. The only issue so far is that it sheds, so you might want to shake if off outdoors before wearing it - I wore if for a short while and ended up with bits of sequins in my shirt underneath and it feels like glitter all over it.

This jacket is a winner!  For reference, I'm 5'7", 140 lbs, size 6 and I chose the Small in green, which is a rich deep emerald color. I found it true to size, with plenty of room to move my arms and the shoulders well placed. I can get fidgety with jackets that lack buttons, but this one stays put due to the non-slippery lining inside.  The sequins are sewn on well, the jacket is a great length, and although it is super sparkly, it could be worn to a nice dinner or out to a concert (the reason I got it!). Holiday occasions would be a no-brainer; it's a great combination of being understated in design, and bold in presentation.  The jacket is warm to wear, so late summer nights through autumn could be the best time to sport this beauty on its own. I'm very happy with my purchase.  In retrospect, I think I would wear it more often if I had purchased it in black.

I'm always wary of buying clothes online through Amazon but this sweater looked so cool I couldn't resist.  First things first because I know that matters the most: This was absolutely perfect to size and I was able to comfortably wear it. No tightness anywhere, arms fit properly. feels good on the back, a decent amount of stretch but still looks nice and formal on the body.  In terms of looks, it looks really good. I love this cardigan. The neat thing about it is you can really tailor your outfit towards it so that if you're dressing up or down it looks good. There are no buttons in the front but even with a larger chest I found that it stayed relatively 'closed' which gave it a casual appearance without it sliding off my body and looking awkward.  I love the little embellishment of the extra lace around the bottom of the sleeves and along the bust, its a small touch that elevates the cardigan even more and gives it a playful air.  Overall this feels really comfortable on the body, looks really good, and seems easy to keep clean.

Every year I buy a different, fun, bling-y top to wear during the winter holidays. This is my top for this year! I'll pair it with a black silky tank and black palazzo pants, and I'll wear it to the Christmas pageant, several different Christmas parties and for New Year's. It drapes beautifully and makes me feel elegant.

评论概述: KANCY KOLE Women's Sequin Jacket Open Front
评论详情: Ordered and received a 2X. Length and width are fine. Armholes are tight and uncomfortable. Sequin fabric itself is soft and flows well, not stiff and scratchy.

I haven’t ever owned a sparkly jacket. I think I might wear it with a white tank top and jeans, and maybe a pair of black loafers for an updated classic look. The jacket is light and drapes nicely. It’s a fun piece.

My KANCY KOLE Women's Sequin Jacket arrived and I was surprised that it was so small. I opted for the XL, even though I often wear a L. It didn't have enough coverage in the front. The jacket gapped from side to side, rather than an opening down the middle as a proper blazer should. Never mind that a blazer also has a button option (this one didn't.) Other than the size problem, the jacket is a beautifully sequined blazer with lining and tiny, lovely sequins. It looks like shimmering black oil and can be worn with many options. I have a fancy dinner coming up, and plan to wear it with a stylish, colorful top and black pants and boots. It will look sensational, but more of my top will show than usual. As my caption read: Pretty, but small.
